name: gawkily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that makes a person seem tall and awkward: The young protagonist is as gawkily vulnerable as a newborn giraffe. She tottered gawkily down the street on her high heels. Related word
gawky
More examplesFewer examplesThe photograph shows a back view of him sitting gawkily in his bathing suit.The host - tall and almost gawkily thin - appeared resistant to the delights of the food spread before him.He is tall and gawkily handsome, but also prone to violent outbursts.
